Example of running:

L2MapViewer --root "G:\\Program Files (x86)\\NCsoft\\Lineage II\\" 13_24 14_24 13_25 14_25 12_24 12_25 14_23

Add --pathnode-off "path\to\pathnode.bin" to view official pathnode data for any loaded regions.
Add --pathnode-l2j "path\to\pathnode" to view l2j pathnode data for any loaded regions.
